output_data.clarification_question: Please specify the total time spent in the encounter, including counseling, psychotherapy, and medical management components, as time is the controlling factor for combined E/M and psychotherapy coding.

primary_code.description: Established Patient Visit (E/M) combined with Psychotherapy (30, 45, or 60 minutes)
primary_code.rationale: This was a follow-up session requiring medication adjustment (*Sertraline* dose increase from 50mg to 100mg), safety assessment (passive ideation/C-SSRS), and significant counseling regarding depressive symptoms (*Recurrent Major Depressive Disorder*). The specific CPT code (9921X combined with 9083X) depends entirely on the documented time.

output_data.medical_necessity: Management of worsening *Recurrent Major Depressive Disorder, Moderate (F33.1)*, requiring dose increase of *Sertraline* and assessment of passive suicidal ideation. High level of medical decision making based on risk and treatment complexity.
